span.span: Â Â Â Cameron Public School, home of the Yellow Jackets, has been serving the families and students of Cameron for around 100 years. Â The last century has seen many faculty come and go and many students graduate and move on. Â There have been many positive changes including additions to the building / grounds, as well as the ball fields. Â

Â Â Currently we have a little over three hundred students in pre-school through twelfth grades. Â They come from varied nationalities includingÂ foreign exchange students. Â In addition to the core classes, students can participate in many extra-curricular activities including: Â baseball, softball, basketball, Ag, FACS, yearbook, academic teams, and FCS.
As we move forward, we will continue to pursue excellence in all areas of the educational process. Â let's make this a great year here at Cameron Public Schools!
